content: stella s hat by melissa labarre size adult yarn 100 yards of any worsted or aran weight that knits up nicely at 4 sts/inch needles us 8 5mm 16 circular needle for body of hat set of 5 us 8 5mm dpns for crown decreases or size needed to obtain gauge notions stitch marker blunt needle for weaving in ends gauge 16 sts and 24 row= 4 inches in main stitch pattern copyright 2007 melissa labarre knittingschooldropout@gmail com 1 i wrote this pattern in 2007 based on the hats my cioci great aunt stella knit well into her 90s her hats were worked flat and seamed but she thought it was pretty neat when i made one on a round needle after just looking at the one she had made me she passed away in 2010 but she lives on in the hats we make and the daughter i named after her thanks for knitting my patterns pattern using the long tail method cast on 80 stitches place marker at beginning of round and join to work in the round row 1-10 work in garter stitch for 10 rounds knit one row purl one row repeat row 11 and 12 knit all stitches row 13 begin working in pattern k2 p2 repeat to end row 14 k2 p2 repeat to end row 15 p2 k2 repeat to end row 16 p2 k2 repeat to end repeat row 13-16 until piece measures approx 6 from cast on edge ending on row 14 or 16 knit 1 row purl one row knit one row begin decreasing for top as follows switch to dpns or magic loop when there are too few stitches to work comfortably on the 16 circular needle row 1 *knit 8 k2tog repeat from * to end of round row 2 knit all stitches row 3 *knit 7 k2tog repeat from * to end of round row 4 knit all stitches row 5 *knit 6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round copyright 2007 melissa labarre knittingschooldropout@gmail com 2 row 6 knit all stitches row 7 *knit 5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round row 8 knit all stitches row 9 *knit 4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round row 10 *knit 3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round row 11 *knit 2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round row 12 * knit 1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round row 13 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round row 14 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round break yarn using a blunt needle thread yarn through remaining stitches weave in ends put your hat on the end copyright 2007 melissa labarre knittingschooldropout@gmail com 3
